DOC.brief_summary: Previous study demonstrate Myo-inositol capable restore spontaneous ovarian activity , consequently fertility , patient PCOS . The aim study investigate role folic acid conteined inositol preparation . The study group include 50 patient , randomly allocate subgroup A ( myo-inositol 1500 gr ) subgroup B ( myo-inositol 2000 gr + folic acid 200 mcg ) . The investigation include menstrual pattern hirsutism score evaluation , hormonal assay , oral glucose tolerance test , euglycemic hyperinsulinaemic clamp lipide profile baseline six month treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Therapy With Myo-inositol Folic Acid Versus Myo-inositol Alone
